item.title: Announcing Bang & Olufsen Audio Components For Sale On The Beolover Blog
item.description: We sometimes have the opportunity to sell restored vintage Bang & Olufsen equipment. We’ve been wanting to do this for a while, and now seems like the perfect time. We recently restored two Beogram 4004 turntables for their original owner, who purchased them new in the late 1970s. The first turntable features rosewood trim, while the second has teak trim. The owner decided to keep the rosewood turntable and sell the teak one.
